backend/main.mo: Defines the backend canister with storage mixins, access control, invite links, data models for cruises, itineraries, bookings, alerts, branding, and in‑memory maps for all entities.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a hero-section layout update to the source file and related components with high confidence.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and main functionality of various frontend React components, hooks, and config files.
frontend/index.css: Defines CSS variables and Tailwind base styles for light/dark themes using OKLCH color values.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file that loads the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app that detects share links and conditionally renders either the shared itinerary page or the full home layout with global theming and dialogs.
Displays toast notifications for admins when new unviewed booking alerts arrive.
frontend/src/components/AdminDashboardDi: Admin dashboard dialog showing alerts, bookings, cruise line logos, and branding settings with tabbed navigation and auto‑marking of viewed alerts.
frontend/src/components/AdminSettingsDia: Dialog for viewing current user role, principal ID, and assigning admin privileges, plus displaying app status and live link info.
frontend/src/components/AppStatusLiveLin: Displays the app's live URL with copy and open actions and shows backend diagnostics including version and last update time.
frontend/src/components/BookingModal.tsx: Provides a dialog for selecting cabins and submitting a cruise booking, calculating totals and handling form state.
frontend/src/components/CruiseCard.tsx: Renders a cruise deal card with images, details, itinerary access, and favorite toggling.
frontend/src/components/CruiseLineLogosM: Admin interface to add, edit, preview, and delete cruise line logos with image upload support.
frontend/src/components/CruiseLinePartne: Displays partner cruise line logos in a responsive grid with loading and empty states.
Shows a dialog listing the user's favorited cruise deals with loading and empty handling.
frontend/src/components/FeaturedDeals.ts: Fetches and displays featured cruise deals in an auto-advancing carousel with error and loading states.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a site footer with logo, links, social icons, and a copyright note.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Provides the site header with navigation, authentication controls, admin tools, and mobile menu handling.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Displays the homepage hero section with background images, marketing text, and action buttons.
Shows detailed cruise itinerary info with tabs, reviews, booking, sharing, and PDF generation features.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Prompts authenticated users without a profile to enter their name and saves it.
frontend/src/components/ReviewSection.ts: Manages viewing, creating, editing, and deleting cruise reviews with rating and form handling.
frontend/src/components/SearchSection.ts: Implements a cruise search UI with debounced text input, filter controls, and dynamic query results from backend hooks.
frontend/src/components/SharedItineraryP: Displays a shared itinerary with branding, handling loading, invalid links, and rendering itinerary details with styled sections.
frontend/src/components/SharedPageBrandi: Provides a form to edit and reset shared page branding settings, syncing with backend and showing loading states.
frontend/src/components/UserBookingsDial: Shows a dialog listing user bookings with status, dates, and itinerary info, including loading skeletons and per-booking cards.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Returns a debounced version of a value that updates after a delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity context with login, logout, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating cruise deals, itineraries, and filtered searches using an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and extensive OKLCH theme variables including light, dark, ocean, and sunset palettes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/colorValidation.ts: Utility functions to validate CSS color strings and safely apply colors or fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/itineraryPdf.ts: Generates a printable PDF-like window for itinerary details using custom-styled HTML.
frontend/src/utils/sharedItineraryBrandi: Merges backend branding settings with default values for shared itinerary pages.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme with OKLCH-based color system, ocean/sunset palettes, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Describes project metadata, existing features, and pending feature requests for Next Time Vacations.
